thread.title: Gowon, Obasanjo, Shonekan, Ekwueme, others form choir, sing for greater Nigeria
thread.title_full: Gowon, Obasanjo, Shonekan, Ekwueme, others form choir, sing for greater Nigeria

author: Tony
title: Gowon, Obasanjo, Shonekan, Ekwueme, others form choir, sing for greater Nigeria
text:
Home » News » Gowon, Obasanjo, Shonekan, Ekwueme, others form choir, sing for greater Nigeria Gowon, Obasanjo, Shonekan, Ekwueme, others form choir, sing for greater Nigeria On 5:30 am In News , Videos by Tony Comments 
Video clip shows past Nigerian leaders and current Vice President singing hymn for a greater, united and peaceful Nigeria in the year 2017. 
Singing Isaac Watts hymn, “Our God, Our Help in Ages Past,” were the former Head of State, Gen. Yakubu Gowon; Former President Olusegun Obasanjo; Former Chairman of Nigeria Interim Government, Ernest Shonekan, Former Vice President Alex Ekwueme; Former Chief of Staff, Real Admiral, Ebitu Ukiwe, General Oladipo Diya and the current Vice President, Yemi Osinbajo. Enjoy the hymn and type your comment below. Tony
